headline.main: Scientists Intensify Research on Marijuana's Effects

docs.abstract: scientists, reporting growing concern among physicians about unknown long-term hazards of smoking marijuana, hold 2-day conf, NYC, to exchange information on basic research into drug; Dr S Yolles, conf co-chmn, says meeting marks beginning of long series of repts of scientific studies that, it is hoped, will provide answers to questions by pub and legislators concerning safety and effects of marijuana; others attending conf comment; illus
docs.lead_paragraph: A panel of scientists, reporting a growing concern among physicians about the unknown long-term hazards of smoking marijuana, met for the last two days to exchange information on basic research into the drug.
docs.snippet: A panel of scientists, reporting a growing concern among physicians about the unknown long-term hazards of smoking marijuana, met for the last two days to exchange information on basic research into the drug.
